content: 2023 work heel decreases 4x 4 decrease row 3 plain row pu 14 sts along each edge of flap work foot until 3 1/2 shorter than desired length toe decreases worked over 23 rnds decrease round 1 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to eor 48 sts k 6 rnds decrease round 2 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to eor 40 sts knit 5 rnds decrease round 3 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to eor 32 sts knit 3 rnds decrease round 4 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to eor 24 sts knit 2 rnds decrease round 5 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to eor 16 sts knit 1 round decrease round 6 *k2tog repeat from * to eor 8 sts references/resources the process of analyzing and reverse engineering this sock was explored in several casual friday podcast segments in late 2022 season 5 episodes 41-43 the entire process of knitting through the sock is shown in season 6 episode 1 casual friday playlist on my youtube channel here https //youtube com/playlist list=pl1azxtfsce2fxasx00ptj69u-prvvxh1a double bind off video tutorial https //youtu be/2hifxn6x_ji my ravelry group rox rocks has a discussion thread devoted to knitting this sock here https //www ravelry com/discuss/rox-rocks/4238332 dagrun s luggar norwegian cabin socks © 2023 by roxanne richardson page 6 of 6 jan 12 2023
